Android PinView/ OtpView



A custom control to enter a four digit code usually in cases of authentication.

## How to integrate into your app? Integrating the project is simple a refined all you need to do is follow the below steps Step 1. Add the JitPack repository to your build file. Add it in your root build.gradle at the end of repositories: ```java allprojects { repositories { ... maven { url "https://jitpack.io" } } } ``` Step 2. Add the dependency ```java dependencies { compile 'com.github.mukeshsolanki:android-otpview-pinview:1.0.2' } ``` ## How to use the library?
